snippet: Dr. Perry Inhofe, the son of Senator James M. Inhofe, Republican of Oklahoma, was killed in a plane crash on Sunday, Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel confirmed.
abstract: Dr Perry Inhofe, son of Sen James M Inhofe, Republican of Oklahoma, is killed in a plane crash near Tulsa, Okla.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Perry Inhofe, the son of Senator James M. Inhofe, Republican of Oklahoma, was killed in a plane crash on Sunday, Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel confirmed.

headline.main: Oklahoma: Senator’s Son Dies in Crash Near Tulsa
headline.print_headline: Oklahoma: Senator’s Son Dies In Crash Near Tulsa
